overview: -student at Aerospace Engineering at METU -interested in user interface, usability, user experience on websites and software applications. -can CSS/XHTML -interested in educational and distance education technologies. -like to brainstorm about existing app features and how to take them to the next lavel. -have some creative ideas that if implemented would add a few very useful websites to the internet that contains useful info and make the internet a better place. -located in Ankara (TURKEY), experiences some limitations in terms of getting initial funding for projects, finding technical team members. -if anyone would like to hear about some of my ideas drop me a line on elvirs@gmail.com
